name: Accelerate (Sunstorm93)
description:
- Rack up Points over time, boosting faster the longer you survive!

- Use accumulated points to drift and slow the stage around you!

- Drift between the obstacles and get a high score!

- Obstacles pick up speed the longer you last!

All assets were acquired and created in during the 2020 GMTK Game Jam.

Music Provided by Freesound.Org

UI/Artwork: @GusGusArt

Code/Game Design: @Brandenthefirst
